td.content: s:a 50 year old white female dispatcher c/o 3 weeks h/o Neurological. NKDA. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol Patient does not smoke o:Height 156 cm, Weight 69.1 kg, Temperature 36.5 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Epilepsy p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to neurology.

s:female dispatcher aged 50 Ys with C/O Neurological. denies any smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 157 cm, Weight 70.8 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 15 a:Epilepsy p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Electrolyte Panel.

s:white female dispatcher aged 50 yrs presents with moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments and moderate pain and discharge in ear. o:Height 157 cm, Weight 71.3 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed dexamethasone - 0.4 mL 3-4 drops in both ears 2-3 x per day, and ordered pure tone audiometry.

s:patient c/o 10 days h/o Neurological. NKDA. she is a f aged 51 years. o:Height 157 cm, Weight 69.8 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Epilepsy p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to neurology.

s:white female dispatcher aged 51 years presents with 6 weeks history of Neurological. o:Height 156 cm, Weight 69 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 62, Respiration 15 a:Epilepsy p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed valproic acid - 15 mg/kg daily, and ordered anterior callosotomy - corpus callosum.

s:51 yr old f dispatcher presents with progressive moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments and moderate pain and discharge in ear for past 12 days. denies any smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 156 cm, Weight 69.6 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed dexamethasone - 0.4 mL 3-4 drops in both ears 2-3 x per day, and ordered pure tone audiometry.
